subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Today’s sports lesson is also one in cultural neurology, as in, exactly what nerve did Manny Ramirez strike so hard with the news that he, too, uses performance-enhancing drugs?
snippet: Today’s sports lesson is also one in cultural neurology, as in, exactly what nerve did Manny Ramirez strike so hard with the news that he, too, uses performance-enhancing drugs?
